title: Lost old account
body:
I was wondering how Riot was with a total account loss. I don't remember my old email or username.

It was a level 30 summoner level account too. I had been playing for free for a long time and had a nice collection of champions all from free points. I have a good functioning computer again and available time. I was hoping to get back into the game but having lost my account I am totally drained of all excitement now.

Does anyone know if Riot will help this poor forgetful man?

replies.body: We would absolutely love to help recover an old account!  Reach out to our account recovery team by filling out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  The information will help us track down the account.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
Okay cool, thanks. I did happen to do the account recovery form twice now but it doesn't appear like its working. I'll continue to watch my email though.
